00060 /** 
00061  * @file cvm-common-errno.h
00062  *
00063  * Description: Cavium specific error codes
00064  *
00065  * File version info: $Id: cvm-common-errno.h 27539 2007-08-24 22:07:42Z fmasood $ $Name$
00066  */

00068 #ifndef __CVM_COMMON_ERRNO_H__
00069 #define __CVM_COMMON_ERRNO_H__
00070 
00071 #ifndef __KERNEL__
00072 
00073 #ifndef _REENT_ONLY
00074 #define errno (*__errno())
00075 extern int *__errno (void);
00076 #endif
00077 
00078 extern int _sys_nerr;
00079 
00080 #define __errno_r(ptr) ((ptr)->_errno)
00081 
00082 /* --- end of slight redundancy (the use of struct _reent->_errno is
00083  *        hard-coded in perror.c so why pretend anything else could work too ?
00084  *        */
00085 
00086 #define __set_errno(x) (errno = (x))
00087 
00088 #endif /* __KERNEL__ */

00094 #define CVM_COMMON_EPERM        1       /* Operation not permitted */
00095 #define CVM_COMMON_ENOENT       2       /* No such file or directory */
00096 #define CVM_COMMON_ESRCH        3       /* No such process */
00097 #define CVM_COMMON_EINTR        4       /* Interrupted system call */
00098 #define CVM_COMMON_EIO          5       /* Input/output error */
00099 #define CVM_COMMON_ENXIO        6       /* Device not configured */
00100 #define CVM_COMMON_E2BIG        7       /* Argument list too long */
00101 #define CVM_COMMON_ENOEXEC      8       /* Exec format error */
00102 #define CVM_COMMON_EBADF        9       /* Bad file descriptor */
00103 #define CVM_COMMON_ECHILD       10      /* No child processes */
00104 #define CVM_COMMON_EDEADLK      11      /* Resource deadlock avoided */
00105                     /* 11 was EAGAIN */
00106 #define CVM_COMMON_ENOMEM       12      /* Cannot allocate memory */
00107 #define CVM_COMMON_EACCES       13      /* Permission denied */
00108 #define CVM_COMMON_EFAULT       14      /* Bad address */
00109 #ifndef _POSIX_SOURCE
00110 #define CVM_COMMON_ENOTBLK      15      /* Block device required */
00111 #endif
00112 #define CVM_COMMON_EBUSY        16      /* Device busy */
00113 #define CVM_COMMON_EEXIST       17      /* File exists */
00114 #define CVM_COMMON_EXDEV        18      /* Cross-device link */
00115 #define CVM_COMMON_ENODEV       19      /* Operation not supported by device */
00116 #define CVM_COMMON_ENOTDIR      20      /* Not a directory */
00117 #define CVM_COMMON_EISDIR       21      /* Is a directory */
00118 #define CVM_COMMON_EINVAL       22      /* Invalid argument */
00119 #define CVM_COMMON_ENFILE       23      /* Too many open files in system */
00120 #define CVM_COMMON_EMFILE       24      /* Too many open files */
00121 #define CVM_COMMON_ENOTTY       25      /* Inappropriate ioctl for device */
00122 #ifndef _POSIX_SOURCE
00123 #define CVM_COMMON_ETXTBSY      26      /* Text file busy */
00124 #endif
00125 #define CVM_COMMON_EFBIG        27      /* File too large */
00126 #define CVM_COMMON_ENOSPC       28      /* No space left on device */
00127 #define CVM_COMMON_ESPIPE       29      /* Illegal seek */
00128 #define CVM_COMMON_EROFS        30      /* Read-only filesystem */
00129 #define CVM_COMMON_EMLINK       31      /* Too many links */

00140 #define CVM_COMMON_EINPROGRESS  36      /* Operation now in progress */
00141 #define CVM_COMMON_EALREADY 37      /* Operation already in progress */

00219 #ifdef _KERNEL
00220 /* pseudo-errors returned inside kernel to modify return to process */
00221 #define CVM_COMMON_ERESTART (-1)        /* restart syscall */
00222 #define CVM_COMMON_EJUSTRETURN  (-2)        /* don't modify regs, just return */
00223 #define CVM_COMMON_ENOIOCTL (-3)        /* ioctl not handled by this layer */
